name: Deep Within My Mind
description:
Hey! This game was made by 2 nerds, who loves videogames, me GuiPix who made all the art and Melancholia who programed everything. 

This is the second game we made, and in a game jam we have a lot of limitations, but we are really proud of the results and I hope that you like the game as much as we liked!

We would love to see your opnion about the game! What you liked and what you disliked, we will work more on the game and be updating it here on itch.io!

You can follow us on our social medias!

Twitter:@MelancholiaPix https://twitter.com/MelancholiaPix
